# dplyr 统计

## `count()`



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code  code-fold="false"}
library(tidyverse)

# 
diamonds %>%
  count(cut)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
# A tibble: 5 x 2
  cut           n
  <ord>     <int>
1 Fair       1610
2 Good       4906
3 Very Good 12082
4 Premium   13791
5 Ideal     21551
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code  code-fold="false"}
# 
diamonds %>%
  count(clarity)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
# A tibble: 8 x 2
  clarity     n
  <ord>   <int>
1 I1        741
2 SI2      9194
3 SI1     13065
4 VS2     12258
5 VS1      8171
6 VVS2     5066
7 VVS1     3655
8 IF       1790
```
:::
:::



## `summarise()`



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code  code-fold="false"}
# 
diamonds %>%
  summarise(
    mean_price = mean(price), 
    mean_x = mean(x),
    mean_y = mean(y),
    mean_z = mean(z)
  )
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
# A tibble: 1 x 4
  mean_price mean_x mean_y mean_z
       <dbl>  <dbl>  <dbl>  <dbl>
1      3933.   5.73   5.73   3.54
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code  code-fold="false"}
# 
diamonds %>%
  summarise(
    min = min(price),
    Q1 = quantile(price, .25),
    mean = mean(price),
    median = median(price), 
    sd = sd(price),
    Q3 = quantile(price, .75),
    max = max(price)
  )
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
# A tibble: 1 x 7
    min    Q1  mean median    sd    Q3   max
  <int> <dbl> <dbl>  <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <int>
1   326   950 3933.   2401 3989. 5324. 18823
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code  code-fold="false"}
# 【我】这部分留到进阶课程吧。
library(skimr)
diamonds %>%
  skim(price) %>%
  as_tibble() %>%
  rename_with(~ str_remove_all(.x, "^(skim_|numeric\\.)")) %>%
  print(width = Inf)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
# A tibble: 1 x 12
  type    variable n_missing complete_rate  mean    sd    p0   p25   p50   p75
  <chr>   <chr>        <int>         <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl>
1 numeric price            0             1 3933. 3989.   326   950  2401 5324.
   p100 hist 
  <dbl> <chr>
1 18823 ▇▂▁▁▁
```
:::
:::
